panels.description: Total number of ready pods in selected namespaces

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster",namespace=~"$Namespace", condition="true"} == 1)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Ready pods

panels.description: Total not ready in selected namespaces

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", condition="true"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready pods

panels.description: Total number of pending pods in selected namespaces
panels.title: Pending pods

panels.description: Total number of ready containers in selected namespaces

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 1)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Ready containers

panels.description: Total number of  unready containers in selected namespaces

targets.expr: count((kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready containers

panels.description: Total number of pending containers in selected namespaces
panels.title: Pending containers

panels.title: Resource Quotas

panels.description:
Limit Ranges in selected namespaces:

Limit Ranges are for managing constraints at a pod and container level
panels.title: Limit Ranges

panels.description: CPU total usage of pods in selected namespaces in cores
panels.title: CPU Usage / Requests Total

panels.description: CPU usage of pods in selected namespaces in cores
panels.title: CPU usage

panels.description: TOP CPU usage per namespace/pod in cores

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum by (namespace, pod)(rate(container_cpu_user_seconds_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!='', container!="POD"}[2m]))))

panels.title: TOP Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: CPU throttled time of pods in selected namespaces in cores
panels.title: CPU throttled

panels.description: TOP CPU throttled per namespace/pod in cores

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum by (namespace, pod)(rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_seconds_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!='', container!="POD"}[2m]))))

panels.title: TOP Pod CPU Throttled

panels.description:
MEM wss total usage of pods in selected namespaces in cores.

MEM WSS (working set size) usage usage of all selected containers in bytes. WSS is the total physical memory (RAM) used by the process, this also includes memory-mapped files and various other resources,
panels.title: Memory WSS / Requests total

panels.description: Memory wss usage  of pods in selected namespaces in bytes
panels.title: Memory usage

panels.description: TOP Pod Memory wss usage per namespace/pod in bytes

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!='', container!="POD"}) by (namespace, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Memory Usage

panels.description: Memory cache usage of pods in selected namespaces  in bytes
panels.title: Memory cache

panels.description: TOP Pod Memory wss usage per namespace/pod in bytes
panels.title: TOP Pod Memory Cache

panels.description: Memory maximum of pods in selected namespaces  in bytes
panels.title: Memory Max Usage

panels.description: TOP Pod Memory max usage per namespace/pod in bytes
panels.title: TOP Pod Memory Max Usage

panels.description:
Network bandwidth  per namespace/pod in bytes/sec

If the pod has host network enabled, the graph represents the network traffic of the host

Check it in Cluster node > Network PODs

targets.expr: sum by(namespace, pod)(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod!=""}[2m])) + sum by(namespace, pod)(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod!=""}[2m]))

panels.title: Network Bandwidth

panels.description: TOP Pod network bandwith per namespace/pod in bytes

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod) + sum(rate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Network Bandwith

panels.description:
Network receive bandwidth  of pods in selected namespaces  in bytes/sec

If the pod has host network enabled, the graph represents the network traffic of the host

Check it in Cluster node > Network PODs
panels.title: Network Receive Bandwidth

panels.description: TOP Pod network receive bandwith per namespace/pod in bytes
panels.title: TOP Pod Network Receive Bandwith

panels.description:
Network transmit bandwidth  of pods in selected namespaces  in bytes/sec

If the pod has host network enabled, the graph represents the network traffic of the host

Check it in Cluster node > Network PODs
panels.title: Network Transmit Bandwidth

panels.description: TOP Pod network transmit bandwith per namespace/pod in bytes
panels.title: TOP Pod Network Transmit Bandwith

panels.description: Network packets dropped of pods in selected namespaces   in pps

targets.expr: sum by(pod)(rate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod!=""}[2m])) + sum by(pod)(rate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", pod!=""}[2m]))

panels.title: Network Packets dropped

panels.description: Network errors of pods in selected namespaces  type as # errors
panels.title: Network Errors

panels.description: Filesystem throughput of pods in selected namespaces  in bytes/s

targets.expr: sum by(namespace, pod)(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=""}[2m])) + sum by(namespace, pod)(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=""}[2m]))

panels.title: Filesystem Throughput

panels.description: TOP Pod filesystem throughput per namespace/pod in bytes

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod) + sum(rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Filesystem Throughput

panels.description: Filesystem IOPS of pods in selected namespaces  in bytes/s

targets.expr: sum by(namespace, pod)(rate(container_fs_reads_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=""}[2m])) + sum by(namespace, pod)(rate(container_fs_writes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=""}[2m]))

panels.title: Filesystem IOPS

panels.description: TOP Pod filesystem IOPS per namespace/pod in bytes

targets.expr: topk(20, sort_desc(sum(rate(container_fs_writes_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod) + sum(rate(container_fs_reads_total{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", container!=''}[2m])) by (namespace, pod)))

panels.title: TOP Pod Filesystem IOPS

panels.description: Ready pods in selected namespaces in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", condition="true"} == 1))

panels.title: Ready pods

panels.description: Unready / Pending pods in selected namespace in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_status_phase{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", phase="Running"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod) (kube_pod_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace", condition="true"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready / Pending pods

panels.description: Ready containers in selected namespaces in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 1))

panels.title: Ready containers

panels.description: Unready / Pending containers per namespace in # of pods

targets.expr: count by(namespace)((kube_pod_container_status_running{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 1) and on(namespace, pod, container) (kube_pod_container_status_ready{cluster="$Cluster", namespace=~"$Namespace"} == 0)) or vector(0)

panels.title: Unready / Pending containers

panels.description: Pods restarts per namespace in # of restarts
panels.title: Container Restarts

panels.description: TOP POD Container restarts per namespace/pod  in # of restarts
panels.title: TOP POD Container Restarts
